attributes.action: Stop daytime TV adverts for Charities targeting the elderly, ill and vulnerable.
attributes.background: Charities should not be allowed to target the elderly, the unemployed, the ill and the vulnerable by a constant barrage of daytime TV adverts requesting 'just £2.00 a month". Rather bring in a Charitable tax for Bankers - problem solved!

rejection.details:
Advertising is regulated by the Advertising Standards Authority. If you have concerns about advertising targeting vulnerable groups at certain times of the day, you can make a complaint to the ASA here:

https://www.asa.org.uk/Consumers/How-to-complain.aspx
